name: Party Games: Drinking Board
description:
Pick a square.. if you dare!

WHAT IS DRINKING BOARD?
Drinking board is a brand new drinking game, gather as many friend as you can and pour yourself a drink!

Take it in turns to pick a square. Hidden behind each one is a task for you or your friends to perform, these can be either a dare, truth, drinking challenge, timed challenge, love challenge or something scary!

FEATURES
- 60+ different drinking tasks with descriptions
- Play with any number of friends
- Beautiful retina graphics for all your iOS devices

COMING SOON
- More drinking tasks
- More languages

Any comments, problems or feature requests tweet us at http://twitter.com/tapboxltd
